mapper.sql: id, order_id, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, zip_code, name, phone, telephone, update_time, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_order_address
id,
order_id,
province_code,
city_code,
area_code,
address,
zip_code,
name,
phone,
telephone,
update_time,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update t_order_address
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_order_address set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select oa.id, oa.order_id, oa.province_code, oa.city_code, oa.area_code, oa.address, oa.zip_code, oa.name, oa.phone, oa.telephone, oa.update_time, oa.create_time, p.name as province_name, ct.name as city_name, ar.name as area_name from t_order_address oa left JOIN t_province p on oa.province_code = p.code left join t_city ct on oa.city_code = ct.code left join t_area ar on oa.area_code = ar.code where oa.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
